question: What is the theme of the 2017 International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women (IDEVAW)?
option1: Orange the World – raise funds to end violence against women
option2: Leave no one behind – End violence against women and girls
option3: Leave no one behind – Raise funds to end violence against women
option4: Orange your Neighbourhood - To end violence against women
answer: Leave no one behind – End violence against women and girls
explanation: The International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women (IDEVAW) is observed every year on November 25 is to raise public awareness on issues of violence against women and girls, including how men and boys can play a more active role in eliminating this violence. The theme of the campaign for 2017 is “Leave no one behind: end violence against women and girls.” This theme reinforces the UNiTE Campaign’s commitment to a world free from violence for all women and girls around the world, while reaching the most underserved and marginalized, including refugees, migrants, minorities, indigenous peoples, and populations affected by conflict and natural disasters, amongst others, first.
